page.title: 18 Living on Longhill Estate
page.content: For a long time there were no telephones, and the{bus service}was not very good. Fewer women worked in the 1950's, and Mr and Mrs Glenton had more visitors then than now. The {houses}were heated by coal. No one had gas fires on Longhill Estate. Mr Glenton is 59 and works as a marine engineer. He works at all of the docks in Hull, and has travelled to many parts of the world working on tugs. At home Mr Glenton likes to work in his garden. He grows flowers and vegetables. Mrs Glenton looks after the{house.}She likes to listen to records and Viking Radio. They both like watching TV and swimming. They travel to Haltemprice baths in their car.
